amount.description: The amount of this transaction. For encumbrances: This is initialAmountEncumbered - (amountAwaitingPayment + amountExpended)

currency.description: Currency code for this transaction - from the system currency

encumbrance.description: The encumbrance associated with the payment/credit taking place

amountAwaitingPayment.description: The amount of awaiting for payment

amountExpended.description: The amount currently expended by this encumbrance

initialAmountEncumbered.description: The initial amount of this encumbrance. Shouldn't change once create

source.description: The readable identifier of the record that resulted in the creation of this transaction

tags.title: tags
tags.description: List of simple tags that can be added to an object

transactionType.description: This describes the type of transaction

metadata.title: Metadata Schema
metadata.description: Metadata about creation and changes to records, provided by the server (client should not provide)

createdDate.description: Date and time when the record was created

createdByUserId.description: ID of the user who created the record (when available)

createdByUsername.description: Username of the user who created the record (when available)

updatedDate.description: Date and time when the record was last updated

updatedByUserId.description: ID of the user who last updated the record (when available)

updatedByUsername.description: Username of the user who last updated the record (when available)
